pkgmetadata.longdescription: Species Distribution Modelling for Rare Species // Performs species distribution modeling for rare species with unprecedented accuracy (Mondanaro et al., 2023 doi:10.1111/2041-210X.14066) and finds the area of origin of species and past contact between them taking climatic variability in full consideration (Mondanaro et al., 2025 doi:10.1111/2041-210X.14478).
